title: Verizon’s Visible outage leaves customers unable to send text messages [Update: Fixed]
content:
It’s not just you: Verizon’s Visible MVNO is currently experiencing an outage that is preventing customers from sending text messages.

Update: Visible’s SMS service has been restored.

more…

The post Verizon’s Visible outage leaves customers unable to send text messages [Update: Fixed] appeared first on 9to5Mac.
